entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle or rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
